0.cdata!:
Solicitacao de Painel de inspecao do
            Banco Internacional para reconstruocao e desenvolvimento -
            Banco Mundial, para o Projeto de Reassentamento dos
            Atingidos Pela Hidroelectrica de Itaparica

abstracts.cdata!:
The Request for Inspection for The
            Itaparica Resettlement and Irrigation Project outlines
            problems caused to the indigenous communities displaced by
            the construction of the Itaparica dam. The Request,
            supported by the group Polo Sindical do Submedio Sao
            Francisco, states that the resettlement plans have not been
            fulfilled and that the better living conditions promised to
            the resettled people have not occurred. The Request
            acknowledges the importance of the dam in bringing
            electricity to millions of people, but also states that over
            150,000 people were resettled and have not received the
            improved living conditions that were promised.
